price: Tenemos temor de que nuestro Señor nos castigue el día [del Juicio que será] terrible y penoso".
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
